description.radar_func_ctrl: Operation Mode (3: Person Trajectory, 7: Fall Detection, 11: Breathing & Sleep, 15: Full Function)
description.radar_install_style: Installation Method (0: Ceiling Mount, 1: Side Mount)
description.declare_area: Area Settings (Format: Area ID, Area Type, x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4)
description.fall_param: Fall Detection Parameters (16-byte array, BASE64 encoded)
description.heart_breath_param: Breathing & Heart Rate Parameters (16-byte array, BASE64 encoded)
description.type: Device Type (TSL60G442 for Wi-Fi Version, TSL60G4G for 4G Version)
description.sfver: Main Control Version (2.0 for HC2 Devices, 2.6 for TK2 Devices)
